name: Power Popper (Little Light Productions)
description:
Power Popper

Power Popper is a fast-paced puzzle game where the player will need to pop items in a level that are energy inefficient to gain money. The player will then need to remove, replace, set behaviors or ignore the items in order to make the home more energy efficient and have an energy efficiency rating of the Scottish average. They must do this within the time limit of the level which will change based on the level type and difficulty. Power Popper will have four levels that the player can choose from, a studio flat, a flat, a maisonette and a house. Each level will have a different number of rooms and will have three different level tiers that will unlock after the player has completed the previous tier.  

The game will feature a cartoon art style in line with games such as candy crush or homescapes. The levels will be 3D with a fixed camera angle that shows off all of the items that the player can pop. 

Install

Download file, unzip, extract and navigate to either Android Build or Windows build. Android copy LLP_APK into phone files to install and application should appear.    Windows run LLP. exe

Controls

Use the mouse with the left click or your finger to click or touch objects or buttons 

Game Play

In level find items that are yellow that effect the energy rating.

Swap them out to get better energy rating values.

If an item is making a sound that means they are on and need to be turned off in the behaviour section.

Once energy is above 61 you can end the level in the pause menu to get the score screen.
